content:
Senior quarterback Baker Mayfield throws the ball March  PERIOD

Oklahoma senior quarterback Baker Mayfield was decked out in Nike gear at the Sooners Pro Day Wednesday PERIOD

After the event Mayfield tweeted it was because he is now part of the Nike family PERIOD

Thanks usnikefootball for lacing me up for my pro day PERIOD Excited to announce that I am now part of the nike family GetGone pic.twitter.com4gXsXmurud

Mayfield did not participate in any of the time or measurement events after he posted good numbers at the NFL Combine earlier this month but he did throw at Pro Day PERIOD

The Heisman Trophy winner threw  yards and  touchdowns in his senior season PERIOD He is expected to go in the first round of the NFL Draft which will take place April  in Arlington Texas PERIOD
